# Qredence Projects

Discover our comprehensive suite of AI reasoning technologies, development frameworks, and enterprise solutions designed to push the boundaries of cognitive computing.

## 🧠 AI Reasoning Systems

<CardGroup cols={1}>
  <Card title="Reasoning Kernel" icon="brain" href="/projects/reasoning-kernel/introduction">
    **Advanced AI Reasoning with Model Synthesis Architecture**
    
    Revolutionary AI reasoning system that implements Model Synthesis Architecture (MSA) for human-like cognitive reasoning in novel situations. Features thinking exploration, semantic kernel integration, and persistent memory management.
    
    <div className="flex gap-2 mt-4">
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded text-xs">Python</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-green-100 text-green-800 rounded text-xs">REST API</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 rounded text-xs">Semantic Kernel</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-red-100 text-red-800 rounded text-xs">Redis</div>
    </div>
    
    **Key Features:**
    - 🧠 Model Synthesis Architecture (MSA)
    - 💡 Thinking Exploration Framework
    - 🤖 Semantic Kernel Agent Integration
    - 🗄️ Redis Memory Management
    - 🔧 Daytona Sandbox Execution
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Complex decision analysis
    - Scientific hypothesis generation
    - Strategic planning and optimization
    - Novel problem solving
    - Adaptive reasoning in dynamic environments
    
    [Get Started →](/projects/reasoning-kernel/quickstart) | [API Docs →](/projects/reasoning-kernel/api/overview) | [Examples →](/projects/reasoning-kernel/examples/basic-usage)
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## 🔮 Coming Soon

<Info>
The following projects are in active development. Join our [Discord community](https://discord.gg/qredence) for early access and updates.
</Info>

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="Cognitive Architecture Framework" icon="network-wired">
    **Multi-Agent Cognitive Systems**
    
    Advanced framework for building complex multi-agent reasoning systems with hierarchical cognitive architectures and emergent intelligence capabilities.
    
    <div className="flex gap-2 mt-4">
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 rounded text-xs">In Development</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded text-xs">Multi-Agent</div>
    </div>
    
    **Planned Features:**
    - Hierarchical agent architectures
    - Emergent reasoning capabilities
    - Distributed cognition patterns
    - Real-time collaboration frameworks
    
    **Target Release:** Q2 2024
  </Card>
  
  <Card title="Knowledge Graph Engine" icon="share-nodes">
    **Semantic Knowledge Representation**
    
    High-performance knowledge graph engine with semantic reasoning, automated knowledge extraction, and intelligent query capabilities.
    
    <div className="flex gap-2 mt-4">
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 rounded text-xs">In Development</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-green-100 text-green-800 rounded text-xs">Graph DB</div>
    </div>
    
    **Planned Features:**
    - Semantic knowledge graphs
    - Automated knowledge extraction
    - Intelligent query processing
    - Multi-modal knowledge integration
    
    **Target Release:** Q3 2024
  </Card>
  
  <Card title="Reasoning Analytics" icon="chart-bar">
    **Performance Monitoring & Optimization**
    
    Comprehensive analytics platform for monitoring reasoning performance, optimizing cognitive processes, and providing insights into AI decision-making.
    
    <div className="flex gap-2 mt-4">
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 rounded text-xs">In Development</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 rounded text-xs">Analytics</div>
    </div>
    
    **Planned Features:**
    - Real-time performance monitoring
    - Reasoning process visualization
    - Optimization recommendations
    - Decision audit trails
    
    **Target Release:** Q4 2024
  </Card>
  
  <Card title="Enterprise Reasoning APIs" icon="building-office">
    **Production-Ready Reasoning Services**
    
    Enterprise-grade API services providing scalable reasoning capabilities with enterprise security, compliance, and SLA guarantees.
    
    <div className="flex gap-2 mt-4">
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 rounded text-xs">In Development</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 rounded text-xs">Enterprise</div>
    </div>
    
    **Planned Features:**
    - Enterprise-grade scalability
    - Advanced security & compliance
    - SLA guarantees
    - Custom reasoning models
    
    **Target Release:** Q1 2025
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## 🛠️ Development Tools & Frameworks

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="Reasoning SDK" icon="code">
    **Multi-Language Development Kit**
    
    Comprehensive SDKs for Python, JavaScript, Go, and Java to integrate Qredence reasoning capabilities into any application.
    
    **Languages:**
    - Python (Available)
    - JavaScript (Available) 
    - Go (Coming Q2 2024)
    - Java (Coming Q3 2024)
    
    [Python SDK →](/projects/reasoning-kernel/sdk/installation)
  </Card>
  
  <Card title="Development Templates" icon="template">
    **Project Starter Templates**
    
    Ready-to-use project templates for common reasoning applications, including business analytics, scientific research, and decision support systems.
    
    **Templates:**
    - Business Decision Analysis
    - Scientific Hypothesis Generation
    - Strategic Planning Assistant
    - Risk Assessment Framework
    
    [Browse Templates →](/shared/development/templates)
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## 📊 Project Comparison

<Tabs>
  <Tab title="Feature Matrix">
    | Feature | Reasoning Kernel | Cognitive Framework | Knowledge Graph | Analytics |
    |---------|------------------|-------------------|-----------------|-----------|
    | **Reasoning** | ✅ MSA + Exploration | 🔄 Multi-Agent | 🔄 Semantic | 🔄 Monitoring |
    | **Memory** | ✅ Redis | 🔄 Distributed | ✅ Graph DB | 🔄 Analytics |
    | **APIs** | ✅ REST + Python | 🔄 Multi-Protocol | 🔄 GraphQL | 🔄 REST |
    | **Sandbox** | ✅ Daytona | 🔄 Kubernetes | 🔄 Cloud | 🔄 Embedded |
    | **Enterprise** | 🔄 Beta | 🔄 Planning | 🔄 Planning | 🔄 Built-in |
    
    **Legend:** ✅ Available | 🔄 In Development | ❌ Not Planned
  </Tab>
  
  <Tab title="Use Cases">
    **Reasoning Kernel**
    - Complex decision analysis
    - Novel problem solving
    - Scientific hypothesis generation
    - Strategic planning optimization
    - Adaptive reasoning scenarios
    
    **Cognitive Architecture Framework**
    - Multi-agent simulations
    - Collaborative AI systems
    - Emergent intelligence research
    - Complex system modeling
    - Distributed reasoning networks
    
    **Knowledge Graph Engine**
    - Knowledge base construction
    - Semantic search applications
    - Research data integration
    - Question-answering systems
    - Knowledge discovery workflows
    
    **Reasoning Analytics**
    - Performance optimization
    - Decision audit trails
    - Reasoning process analysis
    - Model performance monitoring
    - Compliance reporting
  </Tab>
  
  <Tab title="Technical Stack">
    **Reasoning Kernel**
    - **Core:** Python 3.12+, Semantic Kernel
    - **Memory:** Redis, Vector Embeddings
    - **Execution:** Daytona Sandbox, Docker
    - **APIs:** REST, Python SDK, WebSocket
    - **AI Models:** Gemini 2.5 Pro, Azure OpenAI
    
    **Cognitive Architecture Framework**
    - **Core:** Python, Rust, Multi-Agent Systems
    - **Communication:** gRPC, Message Queues
    - **Orchestration:** Kubernetes, Service Mesh
    - **Storage:** Distributed Redis, PostgreSQL
    - **Monitoring:** Prometheus, Grafana
    
    **Knowledge Graph Engine**
    - **Core:** Neo4j, Apache Jena, Python
    - **Processing:** Apache Spark, Elasticsearch
    - **APIs:** GraphQL, REST, SPARQL
    - **ML:** PyTorch, Transformers
    - **Storage:** Graph DB, Vector Store
    
    **Reasoning Analytics**
    - **Core:** Python, TypeScript, React
    - **Data:** ClickHouse, PostgreSQL
    - **Visualization:** D3.js, Plotly
    - **APIs:** REST, GraphQL, WebSocket
    - **Deployment:** Kubernetes, Helm
  </Tab>
</Tabs>

## 📈 Project Roadmap

<Steps>
  <Step title="Phase 1: Foundation (Current)">
    **Reasoning Kernel** - Core MSA implementation with thinking exploration and Semantic Kernel integration.
    
    **Status:** ✅ Available in Beta
  </Step>
  
  <Step title="Phase 2: Scale (Q2-Q3 2024)">
    **Cognitive Architecture Framework** - Multi-agent systems and **Knowledge Graph Engine** - Semantic knowledge representation.
    
    **Status:** 🔄 In Development
  </Step>
  
  <Step title="Phase 3: Enterprise (Q4 2024)">
    **Reasoning Analytics** - Performance monitoring and **Enterprise APIs** - Production-ready services.
    
    **Status:** 📋 Planned
  </Step>
  
  <Step title="Phase 4: Ecosystem (2025)">
    **Platform Integration** - Broader ecosystem integration and **Community Tools** - Open-source contributions.
    
    **Status:** 🔮 Future
  </Step>
</Steps>
